thread.title: How News Organizations are Updating Their Apps for Apple’s New Operating System
thread.title_full: How News Organizations are Updating Their Apps for Apple’s New Operating System

title: How News Organizations are Updating Their Apps for Apple’s New Operating System
text: Print Page by: Laura Hazard Owen | Nieman Lab Apple opened up iOS 9 to everyone for download on Wednesday. Most of the attention is going to ad blocking (and, yep, the No. 1 paid app in the App Store today is an ad blocker), but publishers are also updating their apps for the new operating system, and will continue to do in coming days. (The new version of the Apple Watch operating system, watchOS 2, had also been expected Wednesday, but it’s been delayed.)
